nodes.bodyText: @romain-grecourt Is this still actual? There is no exception downstream can propagate to upstream except NPO, also is blocking of close still neccessary? Only proper way to complete is from upstream's side or maybe wait for cancel from downstream, but in such case we cant complete from upstream with close which is blocked by waiting for cancel.
Not sure why you are asking me, did I write this code ? :D
Sorry I was following the blame 🕵️ . Next one to ask is @tomas-langer who modified the file last, WDYT Tomas?
